lattice

Class ContextWriterText

  • java.lang.Object
    • lattice.ContextWriterText

  • public final class ContextWriterText
extends java.lang.Object

    This class defines the way for writing a context as a text file.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ContextWriterText getInstance()
      Return the singleton instance of this class.
      static void register()
      Register this class for writing .txt files.
      void write(Context context, java.io.BufferedWriter file)
      Write a context to a file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ContextWriterText getInstance()

        Return the singleton instance of this class.

        Returns:
        the singleton instance

      • register

        public static void register()

        Register this class for writing .txt files.

      • write

        public void write(Context context,
         java.io.BufferedWriter file)
           throws java.io.IOException

        Write a context to a file.

        The following format is respected:

        The list of observations separated by a space on the first line ; the list of attrbutes separated by a space on the second line ; then, for each observations o, the list of its intent on a line, written like o a1 a2 …

        Observations: 1 2 3
Attributes: a b c d e
1 a c
2 a b
3 b d e
4 c e
        Parameters:
        context - a context to write
        file - a file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When an IOException occurs
